title: The King Who Would Be Man
description: Haunted by childhood abuse and triggered by years of emotional turmoil in a hostile work environment, The King Who Would Be Man's unnamed narrator is trapped in a maze of madness, struggling to fight the demons tormenting him. But while he's clawing his waytoward the light, darker forces have other plans in mind. Follow this unnamed narrator—who could easily be any of us—in this compellingnarrative as he pulls the reader through the raw, real twists and turns of mental illness, battling the voices within his mind that tempt him toward violence.
author: Brian A. Plank
